title: Student Loan Forgiveness Screws Over Minorities | Guests: Mark Levin & Amos Miller | 8/24/22
description:
Glenn and Stu go over some good news around the country, including the big wins conservatives had in Florida school districts and Sen. Joe Manchin dealing with the aftermath of selling out his constituents. Pat Gray joins to discuss the shocking admission Congress made regarding UFOs. Glenn debunks the belief that Texas is banning Anne Frank’s diary from schools and exposes the intent behind the false narrative. BlazeTV host of "LevinTV" Mark Levin joins Glenn to explain how the Espionage Act works. Glenn dives into the new weatherization program and what this will lead to. Pennsylvania Amish farmer Amos Miller joins to share how his farm is under attack by the FDA for refusing to abide by federal safety standards.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
